Name: Joker
Unlock Requirement: Available before the start - this cheeky chappy shows you the tutorial!
Effect: +4 Mult

Name: Greedy Joker
Effect: Played cards with Diamond suit give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Lusty Joker
Effect: Played cards with Heart suit give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Wrathful Joker
Effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Gluttonous Joker
Effect: Played cards with Club suit give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Jolly Joker
Effect: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

Name: Zany Joker
Effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

Name: Mad Joker
Effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind

Name: Crazy Joker
Effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

Name: Droll Joker
Effect: +10 Mult if the played hand contains a Flush

Name: Sly Joker
Effect: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

Name: Wily Joker
Effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

Name: Clever Joker
Effect: +150 Chips if played hand contains a Four of a Kind

Name: Devious Joker
Effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

Name: Crafty Joker
Effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

Name: Half Joker
Effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

Name: Joker Stencil
Effect: x1 Mult for each empty Joker slot.

Name: Four Fingers
Effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards.

Name: Mime
Effect: Retrigger all card 'held in hand' abilities

Name: Credit Card
Effect: Go up to -$20 in debt

Name: Ceremonial Dagger
Effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult

Name: Banner
Effect: +40 Chips for every remaining Discard

Name: Mystic Summit
Effect: +15 Mult when 0 Discards remaining

Name: Marble Joker
Effect: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

Name: Loyalty Card
Effect: x4 Mult every 6 hands played. (Bonus only applies on every 6th hand played.)

Name: 8 Ball
Effect: Creates a Planet card (if you have room) when the played hand holds at least two 8s.

Name: Misprint
Effect: Adds a random Mult between 0 and 23 inclusive.

Name: Dusk
Effect: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of round

Name: Raised Fist
Effect: Adds double the rank of lowest card held in hand to Mult.

Name: Chaos the Clown
Effect: 1 free reroll per shop

Name: Fibonacci
Effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, and 8 gives +8 Mult when scored.

Name: Steel Joker
Effect: This Joker gains x0.25 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck

Name: Scary Face
Effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

Name: Abstract Joker
Effect: +3 Mult for each Joker card

Name: Delayed Gratification
Effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

Name: Hack
Effect: Retriggers each played 2, 3, 4, and 5

Name: Pareidolia
Effect: All cards are considered face cards.

Name: Gros Michel
Effect: +15 Mult. 1 in 4 chance this card is destroyed at the end of each round

Name: Even Steven
Effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Odd Todd
Effect: Played cards with odd rank give +30 Chips when scored

Name: Scholar
Effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Name: Business Card
Effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored.

Name: Supernova
Effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played to Mult

Name: Ride the Bus
Effect: +1 Mult for every hand played without a scoring face card. Resets to +0 Mult when a face card is scored.

Name: Space Joker
Effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade the level of played poker hand, before it's scored.

Name: Egg
Effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

Name: Burglar
Effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

Name: Blackboard
Effect: x3 Mult if all cards held in hand are Spades or Clubs

Name: Runner
Effect: Gains +10 Chips if played hand contains a Straight.

Name: Ice Cream
Effect: +100 Chips. -5 Chips for every hand played.

Name: DNA
Effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

Name: Splash
Effect: Every played card counts in scoring

Name: Blue Joker
Effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in your deck.

Name: Sixth Sense
Effect: If first played hand of the round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card, if you have room

Name: Constellation
Effect: Gains x0.1 Mult per Planet card used

Name: Hiker
Effect: Every played card permanently gains +4 Chips when scored (until end of run)

Name: Faceless Joker
Effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

Name: Green Joker
Effect: +1 Mult per hand played. -1 Mult per discard

Name: Superposition
Effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight, if you have room

Name: To Do List
Effect: Earn $5 if poker hand is a specific poker hand. The poker hand changes on every payout.

Name: Cavendish
Unlock Requirement: Available from start, but only appears in shops if Gros Michel was destroyed by its 1 in 4 effect during the same run
Effect: x3 Mult, but 1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round.

Name: Card Sharp
Effect: x3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

Name: Red Card
Effect: Starting at +0 Mult, gains +3 Mult when any Booster pack is skipped.

Name: Madness
Effect: When Blind is selected, gain x0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker

Name: Square Joker
Effect: Gains +4 Chips if played hand contains exactly four cards

Name: Séance
Effect: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card, if you have room

Name: Riff-Raff
Effect: When Blind is selected, create up to 2 Common Jokers, if you have room

Name: Vampire
Effect: Gains x0.2 Mult per Enhanced card played. Removes the Enhancement.

Name: Shortcut
Effect: Straights can be made with gaps of 1 rank. There can be multiple gaps in a Straight.

Name: Hologram
Effect: Gains x0.25 Mult per playing card added to your deck.

Name: Vagabond
Effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $3 or less, if you have room

Name: Baron
Effect: Each King held in hand gives x1.5 Mult

Name: Cloud 9
Effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your complete deck at end of round

Name: Rocket
Effect: Earn $1 at the end of round. Earning increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

Name: Obelisk
Effect: x0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand.

Name: Midas Mask
Effect: All face cards become Gold cards when played

Name: Luchador
Effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind.

Name: Photograph
Effect: First played face card gives x2 Mult when scored

Name: Gift Card
Effect: Adds $1 to the sell value of every Joker and Consumable card at the end of round

Name: Turtle Bean
Effect: +5 hand size. Reduces by 1 each round.

Name: Erosion
Effect: +4 Mult for every card less than your starting deck amount in your complete deck

Name: Reserved Parking
Effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

Name: Mail-In Rebate
Effect: Earn $3 for each discarded card of a random rank. Rank changes every round.

Name: To The Moon
Effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at the end of round

Name: Hallucination
Effect: When any Booster Pack is opened, there is a 1 in 2 chance of creating a random Tarot card, if you have room

Name: Fortune Teller
Effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run.

Name: Juggler
Effect: +1 to your hand size

Name: Drunkard
Effect: +1 discard

Name: Stone Joker
Effect: This Joker gains +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck

Name: Golden Joker
Effect: Earn $4 at the end of each round

Name: Lucky Cat
Effect: Gains x0.2 Mult each time a Lucky card successfully triggers.

Name: Baseball Card
Effect: Uncommon Jokers each give x1.5 Mult.

Name: Bull
Effect: +2 Chips for each dollar you have

Name: Diet Cola
Effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

Name: Trading Card
Effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

Name: Flash Card
Effect: +2 Mult per reroll in the shop.

Name: Popcorn
Effect: Starts at +20 Mult, but -4 Mult for each round played.

Name: Spare Trousers
Effect: Gains +2 Mult if a scoring hand contains a Two Pair.

Name: Ancient Joker
Effect: x1.5 Mult for each card played of a specific suit. The suit changes at the end of each round

Name: Ramen
Effect: Gives x2 Mult. Loses x0.01 Mult per card discarded (for any reason)

Name: Walkie Talkie
Effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Name: Seltzer
Effect: Retrigger all cards played for the next 10 hands

Name: Castle
Effect: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded card from a random Suit. The suit changes every round.

Name: Smiley Face
Effect: Played face cards give +4 Mult when scored

Name: Campfire
Effect: This Joker gains x0.5 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated.

Name: Golden Ticket
Unlock Requirement: Play a five card hand that contains only Gold cards
Effect: Played Gold cards earn $3 when scored

Name: Mr. Bones
Effect: Prevents Death if Chips scored are at least 25% of the value required to beat the blind. Self Destructs after it saves you.

Name: Acrobat
Effect: x3 Mult on the final hand of the round

Name: Sock and Buskin
Unlock Requirement: Play 300 face cards (Jacks, Queens or Kings)
Effect: Retriggers all face cards an additional time.

Name: Swashbuckler
Effect: Adds the sell value of all owned Jokers left of this card to Mult

Name: Troubadour
Unlock Requirement: Win 5 consecutive rounds by playing only a single hand in each. (Discards are fine.)
Effect: +2 hand size. -1 hands per round

Name: Certificate
Unlock Requirement: Have a Gold Card that also has a Gold Seal
Effect: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand

Name: Smeared Joker
Unlock Requirement: Have 3 or more Wild Cards in your deck
Effect: Hearts and Diamonds count as the same suit, Spades and Clubs count as the same suit

Name: Throwback
Unlock Requirement: Continue a Saved run from the main menu.
Effect: x0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run

Name: Hanging Chad
Unlock Requirement: Beat a Boss Blind with a High Card hand
Effect: Retrigger the first played card used in scoring

Name: Rough Gem
Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Diamonds in your deck
Effect: Played cards with Diamond suit earn $1 when scored

Name: Bloodstone
Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Hearts in your deck
Effect: 1 in 3 chance for played cards with Heart suit to give x2 Mult when scored

Name: Arrowhead
Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Spades in your deck
Effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored

Name: Onyx Agate
Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Clubs in your deck
Effect: Played cards with Club suit give +8 Mult when scored

Name: Glass Joker
Unlock Requirement: Have 5 or more Glass Cards in your deck
Effect: Gain x0.5 Mult for each Glass Card that is destroyed

Name: Showman
Effect: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

Name: Flower Pot
Effect: x3 Mult if played hand has a scoring Diamond card, Club card, Heart card, and Spade card.

Name: Blueprint
Effect: Copies ability of Joker to the right

Name: Wee Joker
Unlock Requirement: Win a run in 18 or fewer rounds
Effect: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored.

Name: Merry Andy
Unlock Requirement: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds
Effect: +3 discards, -1 hand size

Name: Oops! All 6s
Unlock Requirement: Earn at least 10,000 Chips in a single hand
Effect: Doubles all probabilities.

Name: The Idol
Unlock Requirement: Earn at least 1 million (1,000,000) Chips in a single hand
Effect: x2 Mult when a random, specific card is scored. Card changes every round.

Name: Seeing Double
Unlock Requirement: Play a hand that contains four 7 of Clubs
Effect: x2 Mult if played hand has a scoring Club card and a scoring card of any other suit

Name: Matador
Unlock Requirement: Defeat a Boss Blind in one hand, without using discards
Effect: Earn $8 if the played hand triggers the Boss Blind's ability

Name: Hit the Road
Unlock Requirement: Discard five Jacks at the same time
Effect: Gains x0.5 Mult for every Jack discarded this round

Name: The Duo
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Pair. (Two Pairs, Three of a Kind, and other hands that contain pairs are fine.)
Effect: x2 Mult when the hand contains a Pair

Name: The Trio
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Three of a Kind
Effect: x3 Mult when the hand contains a Three of a Kind

Name: The Family
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Four of a Kind
Effect: x4 Mult when the hand contains Four of a Kind

Name: The Order
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Straight
Effect: x3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

Name: The Tribe
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Flush
Effect: 2x Mult when the hand contains a Flush

Name: Stuntman
Unlock Requirement: Earn at least 100 million (100,000,000) Chips in a single hand
Effect: +300 Chips, -2 hand size

Name: Invisible Joker
Unlock Requirement: Win a run without having more than 4 Jokers at any one time
Effect: After three rounds, sell this Joker to duplicate a random Joker

Name: Brainstorm
Effect: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

Name: Satellite
Effect: Gain $1 at the end of round for every unique Planet Card used this run

Name: Shoot the Moon
Unlock Requirement: Play every Heart card in your deck in one round
Effect: +13 Mult for each Queen held in hand

Name: Driver's License
Unlock Requirement: Enhance 16 or more cards in your deck
Effect: x3 Mult if you have at least 16 enhanced cards

Name: Cartomancer
Effect: Create a Tarot whenever Blind is selected, if there is room

Name: Astronomer
Effect: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

Name: Burnt Joker
Effect: Upgrade the level of the first discarded poker hand each round.

Name: Bootstraps
Effect: +2 Mult for every $5 you have

Name: Canio
Unlock Requirement: A chance when using the Soul spectral card
Effect: Gains x1 Mult when a face card is destroyed.

Name: Triboulet
Unlock Requirement: A chance when using the Soul spectral card
Effect: Played Kings and Queens each give x2 Mult when scored

Name: Yorick
Unlock Requirement: A chance when using the Soul spectral card
Effect: x5 Mult, but alas, only after using 23 discards

Name: Chicot
Unlock Requirement: A chance when using the Soul spectral card
Effect: Disables effect of every Boss Blind

Name: Perkeo
Unlock Requirement: A chance when using the Soul spectral card
Effect: Create a Negative copy of 1 random Consumable card in your possession at the end of the shop
